wikipedia_page.main: Edith Martineau (19 June 1842 – 19 February 1909) was a British watercolour painter.

response: One of Martineau's children was the Pre-Raphaelite watercolourist Edith Martineau.
One of his daughters was the watercolourist Edith Martineau who was interred in the family grave in 1909.
Their seventh child, James (1805 – 1900), was a religious philosopher and a professor at Manchester New College. His daughter was the watercolourist Edith Martineau (1842–1909).
